verbs.description: [ARG0: President Donald Trump 's] spur - of - the - moment decision to [V: agree] [ARG1: to a face - to - face meeting with North Korea leader Kim Jong Un] represented an unprecedented opportunity , but also a huge risk , most recently highlighted by a case of cold feet on both sides .
